post.body: I'm really hoping that ZeroNet will take off! Still needs a bit of work though
Would someone mind sending me a ZeroMail just for the hell of it? I just want to see if I can send and reply things okay
Well, one thing I'd like to see... It'd be nice if a little notification popped up whenever you got a new ZeroMail in your box.
Lots of new people joining up! Great!
Accidentally scared the hell out of my neighbor
Are there any bitcoin faucets or anything like that on ZeroNet here?
Can anyone recommend any good static website generators? (Sorry for all the questions!)
How would you go about explaining Zeronet to a normal not really tech-savvy person?

Well, this is a bit of a longshot, but I'll ask anyways. Does anyone happen to have a little bitcoin/namecoin they'd be willing to give? I'd like to use it site registration on ZeroNet here :)

BTC:  1Gdw86abv3jSH6nMBwkZfUWT35vJtfsyXg
Name:  N3oU7VE5bF2hTqRMDVYuURkgHPd6wcYb8f

Much appreciated!

comment.body: @Method-X: I have plenty of time! Just not much in the way of HTML skill :)
@Mono: Pretty well! Going to have to learn how to do things on here. I'd like to make a nice zite for everyone
I need some sleep! I could've sworn I read "Lucky Nude"
